api/JeremyAnsel.DirectX.SdkCamera.SdkBas.title: Class SdkBaseCamera
api/JeremyAnsel.DirectX.SdkCamera.SdkBas.keywords: Class SdkBaseCamera Simple base camera class that moves and rotates. The base class records mouse and keyboard input for use by a derived class, and keeps common state. api/JeremyAnsel.DirectX.SdkCamera.SdkFir.title: Class SdkFirstPersonCamera
api/JeremyAnsel.DirectX.SdkCamera.SdkFir.keywords: Class SdkFirstPersonCamera Simple first person camera class that moves and rotates. It allows yaw and pitch but not roll. It uses WM_KEYDOWN and GetCursorPos() to respond to keyboard and mouse input and updates the view matrix based on input. api/JeremyAnsel.DirectX.SdkCamera.html.title: Namespace JeremyAnsel.DirectX.SdkCamera
api/JeremyAnsel.DirectX.SdkCamera.html.keywords: Namespace JeremyAnsel.DirectX.SdkCamera Classes SdkArcBall SdkBaseCamera Simple base camera class that moves and rotates. The base class records mouse and keyboard input for use by a derived class, and keeps common state. SdkFirstPersonCamera Simple first person camera class that moves and rotates. It allows yaw and pitch but not roll. It uses WM_KEYDOWN and GetCursorPos() to respond to keyboard and mouse input and updates the view matrix based on input. SdkModelViewerCamera Simple model viewing camera class that rotates around the object. Enums SdkCameraKey SdkCameraKeyStates SdkCameraMouseKeys
